# NSWindow.UserTabbingPreference.always

**Case**

A value that indicates a window should always display as tabs.

## Declaration

```swift
case always
```

## Constants

- **NSWindow.UserTabbingPreference.inFullScreen**: A value that indicates a window should only display as tabs when in full-screen mode.
- **NSWindow.UserTabbingPreference.manual**: A value that indicates a window should display as tabs according to the window’s tabbing mode.

items.description: A value that indicates a window should only display as tabs when in full-screen mode.
